snp1.6:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
snp1.6:1.3: Then, late at night, a glorious deity, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha, bowed, and stood to one side.
snp1.6:1.4: Standing to one side, that deity addressed the Buddha in verse:
snp1.6:2.3: We have come to ask you sir:
snp1.6:3.2: and downfall is just as easy.
snp1.6:3.3: One who loves the teaching succeeds,
snp1.6:3.4: but a hater of the teaching meets their downfall.”
snp1.6:4.3: Tell us the second, Blessed One:
snp1.6:5.2: he has no love for the good.
snp1.6:5.3: He believes the teaching of the bad;
snp1.6:5.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:6.3: Tell us the third, Blessed One:
snp1.6:7.2: a man who does no work;
snp1.6:7.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:8.3: Tell us the fourth, Blessed One:
snp1.6:9.1: “Though able, he does not look after
snp1.6:9.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:10.3: Tell us the fifth, Blessed One:
snp1.6:11.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:12.3: Tell us the sixth, Blessed One:
snp1.6:13.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:14.3: Tell us the seventh, Blessed One:
snp1.6:15.3: looks down on his own family,
snp1.6:15.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:16.3: Tell us the eighth, Blessed One:
snp1.6:17.3: wastes all that he has earned,
snp1.6:17.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:18.3: Tell us the ninth, Blessed One:
snp1.6:19.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:20.3: Tell us the tenth, Blessed One:
snp1.6:21.2: marries a girl with budding breasts;
snp1.6:21.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:22.3: Tell us the eleventh, Blessed One:
snp1.6:23.3: who’s a drunkard and a wastrel,
snp1.6:23.4: and that leads to his downfall.”
snp1.6:24.3: Tell us the twelfth, Blessed One:
snp1.6:25.1: “A man of little wealth and strong craving,
snp1.6:25.4: and that leads to his downfall.
snp1.6:26.1: Seeing these downfalls in the world,
snp1.6:26.4: will enjoy a world of grace.”
